concept.definition: If the constraint is violated, the resource is not conformant.
If the constraint is violated, the resource is conformant, but it is not necessarily following best practice.

description: SHALL applications comply with this constraint?
name: ConstraintSeverity

text.div:
ConstraintSeverity

SHALL applications comply with this constraint?

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/constraint-severity defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
error ErrorIf the constraint is violated, the resource is not conformant.
warning WarningIf the constraint is violated, the resource is conformant, but it is not necessarily following best practice.
